name: Septic Savages
description: After encountering an alien creature in a bathroom stall, one man is propelled into a never-ending quest of sewer dwelling carnage! Septic Savages is a 2D, 1 or 2-player, twin-stick shooting roguelike with loads of randomized elements and hours upon hours of gameplay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP 3 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: WebGL Compatible with latest drivers Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible Additional Notes: Septic Savages runs via NW.js and HTML5
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2 GHz dual-core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia or AMD with latest drivers Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X Compatible Additional Notes: Septic Savages runs via NW.js and HTML5
